00020 typedef enum SpotterType {
00021         DDW_OPTIMAL,
00022         DDW_AGGRESSIVE,
00023         EDW_OPTIMAL,
00024         EDW_AGGRESSIVE,
00025         ED_AGGRESSIVE,
00026         ED_CAUTIOUS,
00027         DTW_AGGRESSIVE,
00028         DTW_CAUTIOUS,
00029         US_AGGRESSIVE,
00030         US_CAUTIOUS,
00031         SWM_AGGRESSIVE,
00032         SWM_CAUTIOUS,
00033         SPRING_OPTIMAL,
00034         SPRING_AGGRESSIVE,
00035 } SpotterType;

00039         AGGRESSIVE,             
00040         CAUTIOUS,               
00041         OPTIMAL,                
00042 } ReportCriteria;

00045 typedef enum StreamMonitorMode {
00046         SMMODE_UNIT_TEST=0,
00047         SMMODE_FULL_TEST=1,

00050 // defaults for spotter params (not all the way at the top because
00051 // can't forward declare enums for a lot of compilers)
00052 static const SpotterType        kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_SPOTTER_TYPE                = ED_AGGRESSIVE;
00053 static const ReportCriteria kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_REPORT_CRITERIA         = AGGRESSIVE;
00054 static const data_t                     kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_CUTOFF                              = INFINITY;
00055 static const data_t                     kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_WARP                                = 0;
00056 static const float                      kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_SCALE_FACTOR                = 0;
00057 static const float                      kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_TIME_MATCH_THRESH   = .5;
00058 static const dims_t                     kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_DIMENSIONS                  = 1;
00059 
00061 typedef struct Sequence {
00062         bool isValid;                   
00063         length_t nSamples;              
00064         dims_t nDims;                   
00065         std::vector<data_t> data;       
00066 } Sequence;
00067 
00069 typedef struct Template: public Sequence {
00070         std::string label;              
00071 } Template;
00072 
00074 typedef struct Stream: public Sequence {
00075         std::vector<Subsequence> patterns;      
00076         std::string name;                                       
00077 } Stream;
00078         //TODO make this a class instead
00080 typedef struct SpotterParams {
00081         SpotterType spotType;                   
00082         ReportCriteria reportCriteria;  
00083         data_t cutoff;                                  
00084         steps_t maxWarp;                                
00085         float scaleFactor;                              
00086         float timeMatchThresh;                  
00087         dims_t nDims;                                   
00088 
00089         SpotterParams(SpotterType spotType                      =kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_SPOTTER_TYPE,
00090                                   ReportCriteria reportCriteria =kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_REPORT_CRITERIA,
00091                                   data_t cutoff                                 =kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_CUTOFF,
00092                                   steps_t maxWarp                               =kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_WARP,
00093                                   float scaleFactor                             =kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_SCALE_FACTOR,
00094                                   float timeMatchThresh                 =kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_TIME_MATCH_THRESH,
00095                                   dims_t nDims                                  =kSPOTPARAMS_DEFAULT_DIMENSIONS);
00096 } SpotterParams;
